body:
First off an apologize for procrastinating and setting everything up a tad late, and even if it went smoother than what I expected it to be, it still had some lag and some problems for forgetting to pregenerate the world. I really apologize.

From our list of players, and after some intense pvp; here are the winners.

 Jolieve  First Place
_Jasun - Second Place
Lego - Third Place

So yeah, I'm planning on hosting more events like this for the community; which hopefully you'll enjoy.

My kindest regards,

Javipepe - Avicus Network Developer, Moderator and Refereex

title: Congrats Jolieve on winning the Community UHC

replies.body: Although I lasted about ten minutes, it's nice to know the person who killed me came in second :3  This was fun, and even though the technical difficulties were prominent, I still enjoyed it.  Looking forward to future things like this :D
